content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I'm here to help schedule your HVAC service. May I please have your name?
Thank you, Margaret. Could you please provide your address so I can check if you're within our service area?
Thanks for the address. Let me check that for you right now.
Hmm, it looks like Iâ€™m having trouble confirming if your address is within our service area. Let me get some human help to assist you further. Please hold on a moment.
reason: agent unable to calculate service area

content: Hi Margaret, this is Judy from XYZ Home Services. Sorry for the confusion! I just checked manually, and you are indeed within our service area. Can you please tell me when would be a good time for our technician to come?
Thanks, Judy. Morning on Thursday would work best for me.
Let me check our schedule for Thursday morning.
We have an opening at 9:30 AM on Thursday. Shall I book that appointment for you?
Yes, that works perfectly. Please book it.
Great, your appointment is confirmed for 9:30 AM on Thursday. We will send you a reminder the day before. Thank you for choosing XYZ Home Services!
